determineMove(Board) - Method in class gamelogic.player.Player
Determines the field for the next move.
determineMove(Board, Mark) - Method in class gamelogic.computer.NaiveStrategy
Determines the move for the computer player based on the naive strategy In this case, the naive strategy is playing a random move anywhere on the board
determineMove(Board, Mark) - Method in class gamelogic.computer.SmartStrategy
Determines the move for the computer player based on the smart strategy In this case, the smart strategy is checking for winning condition before playing the move
determineMove(Board, Mark) - Method in interface gamelogic.computer.Strategy
Determines the move for the computer player based on the strategy implemented
determineRotation(Board) - Method in class gamelogic.player.ComputerPlayer
Determines the rotation for the computer player depending on the strategy chosen
determineRotation(Board) - Method in class gamelogic.player.HumanPlayer
Asks the user to input the rotation number to rotate the board which is done using the standard input/output.
determineRotation(Board) - Method in class gamelogic.player.NetworkPlayer
 
determineRotation(Board) - Method in class gamelogic.player.Player
Determines the rotation number for the move.
determineRotation(Board, Mark) - Method in class gamelogic.computer.NaiveStrategy
Determines the rotation for the computer player based on the naive strategy In this case the strategy is to rotate randomly any board.
determineRotation(Board, Mark) - Method in class gamelogic.computer.SmartStrategy
Determines the rotation for the computer player based on the smart strategy In this case, the smart strategy is checking for winning condition before returning the rotation
determineRotation(Board, Mark) - Method in interface gamelogic.computer.Strategy
Determines the rotation for the computer player based on the strategy implemented
